attributes.action: employ unemployed people in government work schemes, in order for them to receive benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people in the UK are happy to claim benefits and not work.  Work schemes could be set up to allow the unemployed to *earn* their benefits.  People could be placed at a level in the schemes appropriate to their abilities, and this would provide them with work experience and confidence to help them obtain permanent employment.  Examples of work schemes include road building and other infrastructure improvements.
